content.question: One key change immediately following the Civil War aimed at achieving the “racial justice” that Blight describes was the

choices.label: establishment of a constitutional basis for citizenship and voting rights
creation of new agencies to ensure racial integration in employment
campaign by the federal government to eliminate poverty
desegregation of the United States armed forces

content.answer: establishment of a constitutional basis for citizenship and voting rights
